ai-mil3.3.9:1.1_0: “Reverend Sir, what is the characteristic of feeling?”
ai-mil3.3.9:1.2_0: “Great king, the characteristic of feeling is the characteristic of feeling.”
ai-mil3.3.9:2.2_0: “Now, great king, if I were to get the same opportunity, the king would provide that person with the five kinds of sensual stimulation, he would become a trainee. Then he thought, ‘I will surpass that kind of feeling.’
ai-mil3.3.9:3.1_0: Suppose a person was to perform a wholesome deeds. Then, when their body breaks up, after death, they’d be reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm, or a heavenly realm. That’s how I am reborn in a heavenly realm.’
ai-mil3.3.9:3.2_0: That’s how the characteristics of feeling beginning with the characteristic of feeling.”
